channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELFA SD/SQ Series Controller CR1DA-771 of RV-2SD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELFA SD/SQ Series Controller CR1DA-771 of RV-2SD

item.title: CVE-2022-33323|2024-08-03T08:09:21.317Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melfa%20sd%2Fsq%20series%20controller%20cr1da-771%20%20of%20rv-2sd
item.description: Active Debug Code vulnerability in robot controller of Mitsubishi Electric Corporation industrial robot MELFA SD/SQ Series and MELFA F-Series allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access by authentication bypass through an unauthorized telnet login. As for the affected model names, controller types and firmware versions, see the Mitsubishi Electric's advisory which is listed in [References] section.
